title: 我们能做什么去帮助他?
answer: What can we do to help him?

title: 首先，弄清楚他怎么了。
answer: First of all , find out what's wrong with him.

title: 但是他有可能难以听到你或者和你说话
远离窗户和笨重的家具。
answer: Stay away from windows and heavy furniture.

title: 在山里,要当心滚落的岩石。
answer: In the mountains, be careful of falling rocks.

title: 总之，按照在学校里所学到的(地震)知识去做。
answer: In short, follow what you learnt in school.

title: 蒂莉的老师很为她感到自豪。
answer: Tilly's teacher was very proud of her.

title: 地震总是发生得很突然，所以很难给予人们预警。
保持镇静，尤其是当身边还有其他人的时候。
answer: Keep calm, especially when you are with other people.
